title: Ticket #2410: DAGman loses nodes
description:
We got the following report from a Pegasus user: their .dagman.out file has 
08/01 02:31:18 Event: ULOG_JOB_TERMINATED for Condor Node merge_cluster_28 (537276.0)
08/01 02:31:18 Node merge_cluster_28 job proc (537276.0) completed successfully.
and then at the end of the file, it has 
08/01 04:52:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 05:02:27 1200 seconds since last log event
08/01 05:02:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 05:02:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 05:12:27 1800 seconds since last log event
08/01 05:12:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 05:12:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 05:22:27 2400 seconds since last log event
08/01 05:22:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 05:22:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 05:32:27 3000 seconds since last log event
08/01 05:32:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 05:32:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 05:42:27 3600 seconds since last log event
08/01 05:42:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 05:42:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 05:52:27 4200 seconds since last log event
08/01 05:52:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 05:52:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 06:02:27 4800 seconds since last log event
08/01 06:02:27 Pending DAG nodes:
08/01 06:02:27   Node merge_cluster_28, Condor ID 537276, status STATUS_SUBMITTED
08/01 06:12:10 Received SIGUSR1
08/01 06:12:10 Aborting DAG...
So it appears that DAGman's memory that a node completed was corrupted.
remarks:
2011-Aug-23 12:32:56 by nwp:
User reports this problem occurred in 7.6.2.

2011-Aug-23 14:44:54 by nwp:
No, this report came from DAGman 7.4.1. It is difficult to see how this happens in 7.6.2.

2011-Aug-23 14:59:12 by nwp:
I am resolving this and will reopen or make a child ticket if the user reports a similar issue with 7.6 version of DAGman.
creator: nwp
